topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557245336368727afc400300#post_557245336368727afc400300
i know that its from Courage, but honestly there were a lot of more creepier parts to that show, but everyone talks about King Ramses the most, its like always #1 on everyones scariest courage moments.

theres nothing even remotely scary about King Ramses, maybe id disagree if Courage was a bigger part of my childhood, but still, stuff like Freaky Fred and the Youre Not Perfect scene are way more frightening
